Summary: saw coming out of the sky hovering in front of us, shot back up, then came down again in same place , moved around some more then left
divs: Sighting Details i believe i was 12 yrs old when on about 10-15-68 ten pm a friend and i were sitting in his parents car passing time by the river when i saw a object come out from way up in the sky. it came down the side of this hill down to the river just maybe 2 feet off the water and was moving around in short little jumps inside a confind area. fast movements and would stay still also for 2 to 5,6, seconds then move again. it moved back up the hill like it was back tracking a bit then shot back up in the sky in way less than a second and was as small as the stars. my friend an i kept our eyes on it and watched it moving around up there. when it stood still it was so small it looked like any other star. after a about 20 seconds it came back down just as fast, and stopped above the water again. it was moving around like before and came moving up towards where we were at. my friend an i got out of the car an began walking towards it. it was no farther away than 200 feet. at this time at eye level.i was hanging on to him and him me we were telling each other to go get your parents but neither of us would go. we walked closer to it as it hovered and was moving around. this time when we moved toward it, it started to come at us so we both stopped. we must have been 150 feet away from it. there were lights going around in a circle on the outside of it like a billboard sign. it was disc shaped an about thirty feet in dia. it did not make any sound at all. it then started to go back up the hill somewhat, then shot up and out like a 45 degree angle way out in the sky , stopped for a sec then shot straight up from there. it was very far up this time an looked like a very small star but you could still see it very easy. it started moving south, southeast, slowly then picked up quickly then plink it was gone. it moved so fast it just left a streak. i could see it for 25 to 30 miles cause it was so far up, maybe futher.it ate up that distance in maybe 1 tenth of a second if it took it that long. my friend and i just looked at each other an couldn't believe it. it was clear that night no moon no wind no clouds. there was a small airport nearby and during the day i would always see small airplanes making their final approach to go and land. rarley would you see airplanes at night around there.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
